definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: The floor covering is an anthracite needle felt.
sentences.chinese: 地板覆蓋是無煙煤針感覺。

sentences.english: The organic affinity of trace elements decreases further in anthracite.
sentences.chinese: 到無煙煤階段，有機態微量元素含量進一步降低。

sentences.english: The application of anthracite in black powder is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹了無煙煤在工業黑火藥中的應用。

sentences.english: The combustion characters of petroleum coke were between those of soft coal and anthracite .
sentences.chinese: 石油焦的燃燒特性處於煙煤和無煙煤之間。

sentences.english: The combustion parameters of petroleum coke are between soft coal and anthracite .
sentences.chinese: 石油焦的燃燒特性指數大約處於煙煤和無煙煤之間。

sentences.english: The properties of coking coal and anthracite are related to their coal-forming periods.
sentences.chinese: 煉焦煤和無煙煤的煤質特徵與其成煤時代有關。

sentences.english: Why cannot we use anthracite as fuel? Give me a reason.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們不能用無煙煤作爲燃料？說說你的理由。

sentences.english: Hon Gai in Vietnam produces anthracite coal, the materials below for reference only.
sentences.chinese: 越南鴻基產無煙煤，現提供下列資料僅供參考。

sentences.english: We are required by environment protecting department to use anthracite.
sentences.chinese: 環保部門要求我們使用無煙煤。

sentences.english: A new kind of technique, the vortex arch suited to blind coal combustion for conveyor stoker is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種能夠用於鏈條爐燃用無煙煤的渦流拱新技術。

sentences.english: The combustion characteristics of stone coal are similar to anthracite coal and worse than anthracite .
sentences.chinese: 石煤的燃燒特性與無煙煤相近，但比無煙煤差。

sentences.english: The combustion characteristics of stone coal are similar to anthracite coal and worse than anthracite .
sentences.chinese: 石煤的燃燒特性與無煙煤相近，但比無煙煤差。

sentences.english: Detail of this higher grade of coal, anthracite.
sentences.chinese: 上圖是高等級別的煤，也就是無煙煤。
